title.rendered: Purell Alcohol Based Hand Rub Gel Sanitiser Pump Bottle 300ml

excerpt.rendered:
Purell Alcohol Based Hand Rub Gel Sanitiser Pump Bottle 300ml
Purell Advanced formula gel in a convenient 300ml pump bottle

No water or towels needed.

Specially formulated with moisturisers to leave hands feeling soft and refreshed.

Recommended for use on hands that are lightly soiled and in conjunction with a hand hygiene regimen.

Yeasticidal according to EN 1275. Conforms to EN 1500, EN 1040, and EN 12054.
Contains ethanol produced from 100% plant sources

Conditions skin with a natural moisturiser

Readily biodegradable

(OECD 301D)3

Fragrance free and dye free
